Metadata.Title: CVE-2024-6257 affecting package terraform for versions less than 1.3.2-17
Metadata.Description: CVE-2024-6257 affecting package terraform for versions less than 1.3.2-17. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package terraform is earlier than 1.3.2-17, affected by CVE-2024-6257
